name: Rugs.com Soft Touch Shag Collection Round Rug – 6 Ft Circular Smoke Grey Shag Rug Perfect for Kitchens, Dining Rooms
short_description: Polypropylene This round rug is the perfect size and shape for kitchens, dining rooms, or anywhere you want to bring a little more style into your home. The cool, dark bluish-Grey shade of this smoke Grey rug makes it a great backdrop for a soothing, sophisticated space. The thick, fluffy pile and funky abstract patterns make the Soft Touch Shag collection the best way to bring comfort to your contemporary space. Shag rugs offer the ultimate in comfort and texture. Best in low-traffic areas like bedrooms where you want something soft to sink your toes into. Made with high quality polypropylene that is as durable as it is soft. Our rugs stand up abuse even in high-traffic areas.
product_description: Go bold! Shag rugs are often only available in solid colors, happy to be the backdrop to the surrounding decor or letting their textured pile do the work of bringing visual interest to the room. That's not the case with our Soft Touch Shag Collection! Available in bold, contemporary swirls and Moroccan-inspired asymmetric lattice patterns, the Soft Touch Shag Collection takes center stage in any room its in. The dramatic designs are kept in check thanks to cool Grey, green, and blue hues that bring an element of sophistication. Thick, 1/2" shag pile adds another level of texture while also providing a soft place to sink your toes into. The Soft Touch Shag collection is perfect for contemporary living rooms or dramatic bedrooms.

product_description: Safavieh updates the classic solid shag carpet with their Florida Shag Collection. This rug embodies a truly rhythmic and neutral motif that will blend into any living space. Geometrically and equally proportional in design, this Safavieh rug will create harmony in your living space. It also boasts a color complexion that is easy to incorporate into any room for your coordinating convenience. A curvaceous and wavy ogee design adds animation to your living space with a multidimensional high and low pile sculptural weave. Expert power-loomed construction adds durability and longevity to this unique rug. The 1.25 inches of enhanced polypropylene pile is fundamental to the coziness of this shag rug. The colors allow for a plethora of decorating options with its shades of beige, cream, grey, and brown. As an accent or central piece, this attractive and charming Safavieh rug is sure to bring a delightful and refined look to your living space.
